duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure adherence to appropriate IT governance functions and systems development lifecycle.
Facilitate and coordinate the efforts of senior leadership and project managers in the establishment of project portfolio definition and processes.
Support the creation of strategy and multi-year roadmaps for a specific business area and prioritize projects based on business objectives.
Gather, provide, and evaluate data for portfolio selection, prioritization, and execution, and track project results.
Collaborate with IT and business leaders to identify opportunities and facilitate selection and processing of technology solutions.
Direct the development and maintenance of project portfolio communications, reporting, and documentation.
Manage project managers, provide coaching and mentoring, and conduct project portfolio reviews.
Lead large-scale projects following PMO and SDLC processes.
Advise senior leaders on portfolio balancing and manage resources and funding against plan.
Lead reviews of significant initiatives, provide recommendations, and lead change and reprioritization as necessary.
Oversee and manage execution of projects, develop and communicate portfolio objectives, and maintain alignment with business strategy.
Manage at both a broad and tactical level, and analyze and monitor portfolio performance.
Understand current and emerging technologies and attract, retain, and develop high caliber talent.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in technical field or related field of study required. Master’s Degree preferred. PMP certification preferred.
